text: Zenshū Jinja was a Shinto Shrine located in Jeonju. Enshrined deities are Amaterasu Omikami, Emperor Meiji, and Kunitama Omikami . The former shrine status was Kokuheishosha. It was linked to State Shinto and Imperialism rather than local support for Shinto Category:1910 establishments Category:Kokuhei Shōsha Category:Shinto shrines in the Japanese colonial empire Category:Shinmei shrines
title: Zenshū Shrine
